extension.name: Rapid Contact
extension.author: Christopher Mavros
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2011 Christopher Mavros. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Rapid Contact. Lightweight, fast and easy, configuring a contact form, was never a pleasure before.

field.name: email_recipient
field.label: Email Recipient
field.description: The recipient of the contact mail.

field.name: from_name
field.label: Mail From Name
field.description: The name of the message's sender

field.name: from_email
field.label: Mail From Email
field.description: The email of the message's sender

field.name: email_label
field.label: Email Label
field.description: The label next to the email input.

field.name: subject_label
field.label: Subject Label
field.description: The label next to the subject input.

field.name: message_label
field.label: Message Label
field.description: The label next to the message text area.

field.name: button_text
field.label: Button Text
field.description: The text on the send button

field.name: page_text
field.label: Thank you text
field.description: The text displayed to the user when he sends a message

field.name: error_text
field.default: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.
field.label: Error page text
field.description: The text displayed to the user when the message fails to be sent

field.name: no_email
field.label: No Email Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user does not write an email

field.name: invalid_email
field.label: Invalid Email Error Message
field.description: The error message when the user writes an invalid email

field.name: wrong_antispam
field.label: Wrong Anti-Spam Text
field.description: The text to show when the user fails to pass the anti-spam check

field.name: pre_text
field.label: Small Intro Text
field.description: A small text shown before (above) the message form. HTML is welcome!

field.name: thank_text_color
field.label: Text Color
field.description: The color of the Thank you text.

field.name: error_text_color
field.label: Error Text Color
field.description: The color of the Error text.

field.name: email_width
field.label: Email Width
field.description: Width in letters of the email input

field.name: subject_width
field.label: Subject Width
field.description: Width in letters of the subject input

field.name: message_width
field.label: Message Width
field.description: Width in columns of the message textarea

field.name: button_width
field.label: Button Width
field.description: Width in percent of the send button

field.name: label_pos
field.label: Label Position
field.description: The position of the labels relative to the inputboxes

field.name: addcss
field.default: div.rapid_contact tr, div.rapid_contact td { border: none; padding: 3px; }
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: Custom CSS for the form.

field.name: exact_url
field.label: Exact URL
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. If your site is http and your server/host supports https this should be No.

field.name: disable_https
field.label: Disable HTTPS
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. Please enable it if Rapid Contact posts in https and your site is http.

field.name: fixed_url
field.label: Fixed URL
field.description: A simple solution to people that want to use Rapid Contact in an exact page. Change this to Yes and write the URL of Rapid Contact in the Fixed URL Address parameter

field.name: fixed_url_address
field.label: Fixed URL Address
field.description: If fixed url is true, this address is used for Rapid Contact to post itself.

field.name: enable_anti_spam
field.label: Enable Anti-spam
field.description: Enable this to use the anti-spam question for anti-spam control

field.name: anti_spam_q
field.default: How many eyes has a typical person?
field.label: Anti-Spam Question
field.description: A small text question, preventing you from every automated spam

field.name: anti_spam_a
field.label: Anti-Spam Answer
field.description: The correct answer to the anti-spam question

field.name: anti_spam_position
field.label: Anti-Spam Position
field.description: The anti-spam position, relative to the Rapid Contact form.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: If you want to apply a custom style, change this class suffix.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
